thread.section_title: Space City Drones Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Space City Drones | spacecitydrones.com
thread.title: Rob Law
thread.title_full: Space City Drones reviewed by Rob Law

author: Rob Law
title: Rob Law
text:
Jason from Space City Drones was so helpful. We purchased a different drone from another company, had nothing but issues with it, like getting it to fly... Jason had the answers. The other one had sinking issues with the controller and he knew all about it. We bought a different drone from him and we love it! Finally we have our Christmas present in March!
Thank You Jason
